summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackL'ANZA's Healing Strength Detangling Primer is a lightweight leave-in primer that prepares fragile hair for effortless styling to detangle, strengthen, and protect. It prevents future breakage while priming and conditioning the hair for damage-free styling.
details: DetailsBenefits7.5x less BREAKAGE*Strengthens and fortifies every strandDetangles effortlessly with a lightweight feelPrimes hair for styling and heat protectionKey IngredientsNeem Plant Fortifying Complex: Rebuilds and restores weak, damaged hair with a transformative formula designed to reduce breakage and strengthen from within. Nourishes and replenishes essential nutrients to enhance strength and resilience. Seals and protects the cuticle to prevent split ends.Disclaimers*Based on independent instrument testing of hair breakage using a regimen of Healing Strength Shampoo, Conditioner, Detangling Primer & Silk Serum vs. hair treated with non-conditioning shampoo.Item 2638949How To UseSpray throughout damp hair and leave in.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Melia Azadirachta Seed Oil, Dimethiconol Cysteine, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Fruit Extract, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Lactic Acid, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Dimethiconol Meadowfoamate, Sodium PCA, Magnesium PCA, Zinc PCA, Manganese PCA, Cereus Grandiflorus (Cactus) Flower Extract, Panthenol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Ceteareth-7, Ceteareth-25, Trimethylsiloxyamodimethicone, C11-15 Alketh-7, C12-16 Alketh-9, Trideceth-12, Citric Acid, Silicone Quaternium-3, Polyquaternium-73, PEG-8 Dimethicone, Quaternium-95, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Potassium Sorbate, Propanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Fragrance (Parfum), Citral, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool.
how_to_use: Spray throughout damp hair and leave in.

reviews.headline: Cleanest hair line I've ever used
reviews.comments: I recommend for anyone looking for something thats not going to ruin or damage hair like every other shampoo brand that has silly marketing. Lanza actually works and its peoducts speak for themself.

reviews.headline: Great dry shampoo
reviews.comments: After rubbing the spray down to my scalp for 30 sec, I can brush my hair in any style I like. It lasts me 2 days, smalls lightly clean, unlike floral scented others. Plus it leaves minimal dry residue. Highly recommended.

reviews.headline: AWFUL
reviews.comments: I sprayed this in my hair and it is clear you cant see where its at. It made my roots tangle and feel gritty. After rubbing it in my hair was still greasy and it feels even worse now.

reviews.headline: Wow
reviews.comments: I am hard to impress, or should i say my hair is, when it comes to trying new products. I have thick, course, low-porosity hair that tangles easily. I noticed an immediate difference after my first use. It left my hair so soft, shiny and not tangly. I never air dry my hair but I was running late to work one morning and used this before putting my hair in a braid. I can't wait to use this again next wash and heat style. I can only imagine it's going to look and feel even better. Will be buying the full size once I run out & explore other products in this healing strength line. Sorry for the long rant and you rock if you made it this far.

reviews.headline: Best Hair Detangler
reviews.comments: This is the best hair detangler I've ever used.  I've tried many different brands in search of the best one for me and this is it!  I have naturally curly/wavy, frizzy hair and sensitive skin and have had a hard time finding a detangler that reduces breakage, leaves hair feeling soft and doesn't clog the pores on my scalp.  Just a few sprays of this detangler and I can easily comb through my hair, haven't had a clogged pore since I started using it and my hair feels nice and soft.  It also has a nice, light subtle scent that is not overpowering.  It also comes in a travel size so I can take it wherever I go!  Although it is pricy, it is definitely worth the money, the bottle will last a long time and Ulta offers coupon codes for $10 off that can be used on prestige brands and combines with using reward points to reduce the price.  This is now the only detangler I need and use...hopefully L'anza will never change the formula!

reviews.headline: Very Impressed
reviews.comments:
I have two beautiful kiddos with pretty tight curls. I have used so many different types of detangling spray. All different price ranges. I'm blown away by this product. 
I felt like detangling spray was going so quick in our house. I was constantly buying it. But this product will last! What usually takes 5-8 squirts takes 3â€¦3! Using this product will save me so much money in detangling spray! And it smells amazing. 

Huge win!

reviews.headline: Must HAVE Detangler!
reviews.comments: Neem Plant Detangling Primer Spray is an all time game changer!  Lightweight, detangles my hair instantly, smells AMAZING, and that shine!  Love that it has thermal and UV protection too!

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: My hair is so much stronger from using this primer and I have so much less breakage. I also bought a bottle for my 5 year old niece who has curly hair and it's helps with all her knots and everyone loves the smell!

reviews.headline: My new go to leave in!
reviews.comments: This product smells amazing, is light weight, and gives my hair a lot of shine, but it also helps keep my long hair tangle free!  I use it every day!

reviews.headline: I would absolutely buy this product again!
reviews.comments: LOVE this product and highly recommend  It is so lightweight & easily detangles leaving my hair hair silky soft.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again!
reviews.comments: The best product I have used for detangling.

reviews.headline: Top tier detangler, exclusive quality
reviews.comments: I'm so glad I was able to find this in stores, in my opinion L'anza always provide top quality products and this detangler was no different!

reviews.headline: Great detangling and healing for fine hair
reviews.comments: I love this product for my fine, highlighted hair. It's light weight, silky and shiny. I see it healing my hair each use. I love that it has heat protection also! I can still get volume using this leave in product! I use it on my hair wet and on dry days to refresh my style.

reviews.headline: The best and highest quality detangler!
reviews.comments: I love this product. Not only does it do it's job to detangle but it strengthens my hair, adds shine and protects against heat and UV. Not to mention, it smells amazing!

reviews.headline: Game-changer SHINE!
reviews.comments: My hair feels so silky and has the absolute most beautiful shine with this product! I can get right through any tangles in my hair which is long and lightly textured. The smell is incredible but not over-powering-LOVE!

reviews.headline: Actually prevents breakage!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for 3 weeks now and can genuinely tell a difference in my hair when using it prior to blowdrying! It helps smooth out my hair and way less of it breaks off. It smells amazing & I also use it for when I wear my hair naturally curly :)

reviews.headline: L'ANZA Neem Plant Detangling Primer is a must have.
reviews.comments: This is an amazing light weight detangler with thermal & UV protection. A product you can't live without.

reviews.headline: FRIZZ GONE!!!!
reviews.comments: I have always had frizzy hair specially after waking up. I tried this product, and I am loving how it completely took it away!! I also use it after I shower. I highly recommend this product

reviews.headline: Leaves my hair shinier and softer, without weighing it down
reviews.comments: I have long, dry, curly hair and have been leaving in conditioner for many years to keep my hair protected and less dry. This L'ANZA Neem Plant Detangling Hair Primer spray really adds a nice level of protection to my hair in the summer sun.

reviews.headline: Bought for a friend, now they're addicted
reviews.comments: Bought this for a friend with long, curly, dry hair. They have now repurchased multiple times and use other lanza products. Going to start gifting this to more people!

I have naturally curly/wavy, frizzy hair and sensitive skin and have had a hard time finding a detangler that reduces breakage, leaves hair feeling soft and doesn't clog the pores on my scalp.  Just a few sprays of this detangler and I can easily comb through my hair, haven't had a clogged pore since I started using it and my hair feels nice and soft.
